card.name: Eager Voter
card.text: Lifelink When Eager Voter enters, make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)

card.text: Whenever Magnetic Rhetorician attacks, make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)

card.name: Held in Contempt

card.text: Lifelink {5}, {T}: Tap target creature. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is your approval. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Medic's Implant
card.text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Teach it lifelink. (Put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Seasoned Spymaster
card.text: Vigilance When Seasoned Spymaster enters, teach target creature vigilance. (Put a vigilance counter on it. If it already has vigilance, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Retaliatory Outburst
card.text: This spell has lifelink as long as you control a creature with lifelink. (Damage dealt by this spell also causes you to gain that much life.) Retaliatory Outburst deals 4 damage to target tapped creature.

card.name: Enforcer's Baton
Codename Cicada
card.text: Flying {1}, {T}: Surveil 1. This ability costs {1} less to activate if you control a blue permanent. (To surveil 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Rogue Justiciar
card.text: Whenever Rogue Justiciar becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may tap target creature. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Border Junction
card.text: Defender {3}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Border Junction: Create three 1/1 colorless Soldier creature tokens. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Change Allegiances
card.text: Choose one — • Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Replicated Regiment
card.text: Replicated Regiment enters with a +1/+1 counter and a vigilance counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move a counter from Replicated Regiment onto another creature.

card.name: Informed Voter
card.text: Vigilance When Informed Voter enters, make a pledge. (Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)

card.name: Election Fraud
card.text: Draw a card. Make a pledge, then make a pledge again. (Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost. Repeat this process once.)

card.name: Dampening Reconciliator
card.text: When Dampening Reconciliator enters, tap up to one target creature and put X stun counters on it, where X is your approval. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color. If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Political Prisoner

card.text: Target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard. Draw a card.

Otherwise, return it to your hand. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.) When Senators' Chauffeur dies, exile it.

card.text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, make a pledge. (Create any green Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.)

card.name: Cabinet Recruiter
card.text: When Cabinet Recruiter enters, you may search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to your approval, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Insurgency Mentor
card.text: Trample Whenever Insurgency Mentor attacks, teach target attacking creature with lesser power trample. (To teach trample, put a trample counter on it. If it already has trample, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Scourge of Capitalism
card.text: Trample When Scourge of Capitalism enters, it fights target creature with the greatest power or tied for the greatest power among creatures you don't control. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.

card.name: Prismatic Confluence
card.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a colorless permanent card, a monocolored permanent card, and/or a multicolored permanent card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sustainable Investments
card.text: When Sustainable Investments enters, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") Treasures you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Sleeper Insurgent
card.text: Sleeper Insurgent doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever Sleeper Insurgent becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, untap it. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Sillaman Regrafter
card.text: When Sillaman Regrafter enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever a creature you control dies, you may move a counter from it onto another target creature.

card.name: Instigating Directive
card.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw that many cards. If {R} was spent to cast this spell, it gains trample until end of turn. If {W} was paid to cast this spell, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Private Investigators
card.text: Vigilance Creatures you control with vigilance have "{W}{U}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn."

card.name: Eyes in the Sky
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature you control with flying deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {UB}. If you paid {U}, draw a card. If you paid {B}, that player discards a card.

card.name: Loophole Exploiter
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) {B}{R}: Target creature with power 4 or less can't be blocked by more than one creature this turn.

card.name: Metropolitan Champion
card.text: Trample Creatures you control with trample have "{1}{R}{G}: This creature must be blocked each combat this turn if able."

card.name: Nourishing Orator
card.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Nourishing Orator. {2}{G}{W}: Nourishing Orator gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Genetics Prodigy
card.text: Genetics Prodigy enters with a +1/+1 counter, a flying counter, and a vigilance counter on it. Whenever Genetics Prodigy attacks, you may remove a counter from it. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Chittering Gargantua
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice any number of creatures, then exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card or token sacrificed or exiled this way. Flying

card.name: Devoted Lackies
card.text: Deathtouch When you sacrifice Devoted Lackies as a cost to cast a spell or activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy that spell or ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Speculative Stockbroker
card.text: Whenever another creature you control enters, you may pay {X}{X}. If you do, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Underclass Hero
card.text: Lifelink Spells you cast and abilities you activate that target creatures you control cost {2} less. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

card.name: Social Engineering
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you controlled it, create a token that's a copy of it. Otherwise, create a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Search and Seizure
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. Otherwise, draw a card.

card.name: Liquidate
card.text: Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Its controller creates a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Vertical Integration
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap any number of untapped creatures you control. Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn, where X is the total power of creatures tapped to pay this spell's additional cost.

card.name: Charity Match
card.text: Teach target creature you control lifelink. It fights up to one target creature you don't control. (To teach lifelink, put a lifelink counter on it. If it already has lifelink, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Security Initiative
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) Flash When Security Initiative enters, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent. Then draw a card. An opponent controls three or more tapped nonland permanents. --- (Back): Surveillance State

card.name: Surveillance State
card.text: You may cast spells as though they had flash. Whenever you cast a spell, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent. --- (Front): Security Initiative

card.name: Silence the Opposition
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Silence the Opposition enters, draw two cards, then discard a card. A creature card or creature token was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. --- (Back): Authoritarianism

card.name: Authoritarianism
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0. Creatures you don't control get -1/-0. --- (Front): Silence the Opposition

card.name: Meeting of the Elites
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Meeting of the Elites enters, create a tapped Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") You've sacrificed a nonland permanent this turn. --- (Back): Aristocracy

card.name: Aristocracy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library. You may play cards exiled with Aristocracy as long as you've sacrificed a nonland permanent this turn. --- (Front): Meeting of the Elites

card.name: Free Market
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Free Market enters, target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You control a creature with power 4 or greater. You control a creature with toughness 4 or greater. --- (Back): Industrialism

card.name: Industrialism
card.text: Whenever you attack, double target attacking creature's power and toughness until end of turn. --- (Front): Free Market

card.name: Together in Arms
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Together in Arms enters, create two 1/1 colorless Soldier creature tokens. You controlled a spell that targeted a creature you controlled this turn. You controlled an ability that targeted a creature you controlled this turn. --- (Back): Communitarianism

card.name: Communitarianism
card.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability that targets only it, you may copy that spell or ability for each other creature you control that spell or ability could target. Each copy targets a different one of those creatures. Do this only once each turn. --- (Front): Together in Arms

card.name: Codename Spyder
card.text: When Codename: Spyder enters, mill three cards. Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from your library, you may return up to one of those cards to your hand. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: The First Battalion
card.text: When The First Battalion enters, create two 2/2 colorless Minion creature tokens with decayed. (They can't block. When one attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) Minions you control lose all abilities.

card.name: Sola, Contraband Playboy
card.text: When Sola enters, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {2}, Sacrifice a Treasure: You gain 3 life. {2}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

card.name: Mondo, Outcast Maverick
card.text: Trample Whenever Mondo attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking, then Mondo gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Carlisle, Grid Globalizer
card.text: Vigilance Once each turn, if you would put one or more counters on a creature you control, you may put that many of each of those kinds of counters on each creature you control instead.

card.name: Central Processor
card.text: {W}, Exile an artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard: You gain 3 life. {2}{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Draw a card. {4}{B}, Exile a creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with three +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Assault Engine
card.text: Haste When Assault Engine enters, gain control of target creature and untap it. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. (It's still affected by summoning sickness, but can crew.) Crew 2

card.name: Black-Tie Gala
card.text: Creatures you control have "{T}: Create a Treasure token." (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.") {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}, Sacrifice Black-Tie Gala: Draw two cards.

card.name: Urban Twinmotors
card.text: Double strike Whenever Urban Twinmotors deals combat damage to a player, untap up to one target permanent.

card.name: Bioengineered Opus
card.text: Bioengineered Opus enters with three +1/+1 counters, a lifelink counter, and a vigilance counter on it. When Bioengineered Opus dies, for each creature you control, you may move a counter from Bioengineered Opus onto that creature.

card.name: Reconnaissance Agent
card.text: When Reconnaissance Agent enters, you may choose one — • Exile target card from your graveyard. • Exile another target creature. When Reconnaissance Agent leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's hand.

card.name: Blackout
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Adaptive Hydra
card.text: When Adaptive Hydra enters, teach it your choice of haste, menace, or vigilance. Then repeat this process X times. (To teach a keyword, put a keyword counter of that kind on it. If it already has that keyword, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Storm the Senate
card.text: Any number of creatures you control fight different creatures you don't control. Each other creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Dissect
card.text: Exile target creature. Distribute two +1/+1 counters among up to two target creatures you control.

card.name: Tiril District
card.text: Tiril District enters tapped unless you control a Plains, an Island, and a Swamp. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

card.name: Hazakh District
card.text: Hazakh District enters tapped unless you control an Island, a Swamp, and a Mountain. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

card.name: Vishanki District
card.text: Vishanki District enters tapped unless you control a Swamp, a Mountain, and a Forest. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

card.name: Penrath District
card.text: Penrath District enters tapped unless you control a Mountain, a Forest, and a Plains. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

card.name: Sillaman District
card.text: Sillaman District enters tapped unless you control a Forest, a Plains, and an Island. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

card.name: Distributive Justice
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Distributive Justice enters, distribute up to two +1/+1 counters among one or two target creatures you control. You control two or more creatures with the same power. You control two or more creatures with the same toughness. --- (Back): Equality

card.name: Equality
card.text: Whenever you attack, draw a card if you control two or more attacking creatures with the same power or the same toughness. --- (Front): Distributive Justice

card.name: Chromatic Rift
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy all multicolored creatures. • Destroy all monocolored creatures. • Destroy all colorless creatures.

card.name: Mellan, Defense Attorney
card.text: When Mellan, Defense Attorney enters, make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) {T}: Choose a color from among other permanents you control. Another target creature you control gains hexproof from that color until end of turn. It can't be blocked by creatures of that color this turn.

card.name: Genotype Splicer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {X}. When you do, choose up to X. Each mode must have different targets. • Teach target creature flying. (To teach a keyword, put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that keyword, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.) • Teach target creature lifelink. • Teach target creature vigilance.

card.name: Severin's Masterwork
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control. {G}{W}{U}, Remove five counters from among creatures you control, Sacrifice Severin's Masterwork: Create Chaneryx, Perfect Lifeform, a legendary 10/10 green, white, and blue Leviathan creature token with ward {10}.

card.name: Army Reserves
card.text: Army Reserves enters with X +1/+1 counters and a defender counter on it. {1}: Move a counter from Army Reserves onto another target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Research Grant
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Research Grant enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You've cast two or more spells this turn. You've drawn two or more cards this turn. --- (Back): Progress

card.name: Progress
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {X}, where X is that spell's mana value. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Do this only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) --- (Front): Research Grant

card.name: Quid Pro Quo
card.text: Exchange control of target spell or creature you control and target spell or creature an opponent controls. Controllers of spells exchanged this way may choose new targets for them.

card.name: Sterling, Federal Informant
card.text: Sterling enters under the control of an opponent of your choice. At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Play with the top card of your library revealed. Your opponents may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library during their turns, and they may spend mana of any type to cast spells this way.

card.name: Congressional Kraken
card.text: Flash When Congressional Kraken enters, return each nonland permanent with mana value less than or equal to your approval to their owners' hands. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Demographer
card.text: When Demographer enters, draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a nonland card this way, make a pledge. (Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. When you discard a nonland card this way, make a pledge.

card.name: Thesis on Mutation
card.text: Draw a card if a creature you control has flying. Do the same for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Ascend to Power
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Ascend to Power enters, you may sacrifice a creature, discard a card, or pay 3 life. If you do, draw two cards. You've sacrificed a nonland permanent this turn. You've discarded a card this turn. You've lost life this turn. --- (Back): Omnipotence

card.name: Omnipotence
card.text: Your maximum hand size is zero. Pay 1 life: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery. --- (Front): Ascend to Power

card.name: The Venerable Veteran
card.text: Decayed (This can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.) You may cast The Venerable Veteran from your graveyard.

card.name: Serve Again
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a Minion and has decayed. (It loses all other creature types. It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Judge, Jury, and Executioner
card.text: Flying When Judge, Jury, and Executioner enters, exile up to one target creature with mana value less than or equal to your approval. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Corrupt Congressman
card.text: Whenever Corrupt Congressman enters or attacks, make a pledge. (Create any black Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate one of its Pledges without paying its cost.) Cliques you control have "Pledge — {4}: Each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card or sacrifice a creature. Activate only as a sorcery."

card.name: Cryptology
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a card from your graveyard. Search your library for a card with the same mana value as the exiled card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Sparks of a Revolution
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Sparks of a Revolution enters, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token. It gains haste until end of turn. Three or more sources you controlled dealt damage this turn. A source you controlled dealt 3 or more damage this turn. --- (Back): Freedom

card.name: Freedom
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking. --- (Front): Sparks of a Revolution

card.name: Puppet War
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. You choose which creatures block this turn and how those creatures block.

card.name: Alamer, Profit Rerecorder
card.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if mana from an artifact source was spent to cast it, you may copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy. Do this only once each turn. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: Flaw in the System
card.text: Haste Whenever a player spends one or more mana from a nonbasic source, Flaw in the System deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Lightning Warmonger
card.text: {T}: Add {R}{R}{R}. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it enters with an additional haste counter and decayed counter on it. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Penrath Firearm
card.text: Haste Whenever Penrath Firearm attacks, create a colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature gets +2/+0" and equip {2} attached to target attacking creature.

card.name: Golden Age
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Golden Age enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You've cast a multicolored spell this turn. --- (Back): Harmony

card.name: Harmony
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target multicolored card from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast a copy of it this turn. (You still pay its costs. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.) --- (Front): Golden Age

card.name: Chromagoyf
card.text: Chromagoyf's power is equal to your approval and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Aspiring Anarchist
card.text: Trample Whenever Aspiring Anarchist attacks, you may have its base power and toughness become equal to the power and toughness of another target attacking creature until end of turn.

card.name: Subsidized Market
card.text: {T}: Create a Treasure token. {T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery. {T}, Sacrifice two Treasures: Create a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with four +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}: Untap Subsidized Market.

card.name: Zeno, Planar Engineer
card.text: Whenever a counter is put on another creature you control, you may put a counter of the same kind on Zeno. Then if there are no other counters of that kind on Zeno, draw a card. Do this only once each turn.

card.name: Disestablishmentarianism
card.text: Activated abilities of other artifacts and enchantments with mana value 3 or less can't be activated. {1}, Sacrifice Disestablishmentarianism: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Neuralinked Hive
card.text: Creatures you control with counters on them have all activated abilities of other creatures you control with counters on them. {1}, {T}: Teach target creature vigilance. (Put a vigilance counter on it. If it already has vigilance, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Identity Forger
card.text: {X}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a token that's a copy of target nontoken creature you control other than Identity Forger with mana value X.

card.name: Campaign Rally
card.text: Whenever you attack, draw a card for each attacking creature with power 4 or greater, then put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking creature with power 3 or less.

card.name: Empowered Revisionary
card.text: Lifelink Whenever Empowered Revisionary attacks, if its power is greater than its base power, create a number of 1/1 colorless Soldier creature tokens equal to the difference.

card.name: Eyes of the Bureau
card.text: Flying, vigilance If you would draw a card, you may exile a card from your graveyard instead. When you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card that shares a card type with the exiled card. Put that card into your hand, and the rest on the bottom in a random order.

card.name: Defect
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Gatherer of Grievances
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each opponent sacrifices a permanent that shares a card type with it. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Gatherer of Grievances deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to target player. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Vishanki Hellkite
card.text: Flying, trample, haste Vishanki Hellkite enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each mana from an artifact source spent to cast it.

card.name: Axiomatic Shift
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, remove any number of counters from among creatures you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each counter removed this way. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Whirring Inspector
card.text: Flash Flying When Whirring Inspector enters, look at target player's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it until your next turn. When you don't, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until your next turn. (That card returns to its owner's hand, or that permanent returns to the battlefield under its owner's control.)

card.name: Envoy of the Fallen
card.text: Lifelink When Envoy of the Fallen enters, return any number of target creature cards with total mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice another creature: Envoy of the Fallen deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Freightyard Scrappers
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a nonland permanent. If you do, it costs {X} less to cast, where X is that permanent's mana value. Ward—Sacrifice a nonland permanent. Whenever Freightyard Scrappers attacks, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent.

card.name: Penrath Dispatcher
card.text: Haste Whenever Penrath Dispatcher attacks, choose one. X is the number of attacking creatures. • Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. • You may put a creature card with mana value X or less from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Genome Project
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters, teach it flying if a creature you control has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance. (To teach a keyword, put a counter of that kind on it. If it already has that keyword, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Tiril Agenda
card.text: Choose up to one for each color among white, blue, and black among permanents you control. • Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Tiril Agenda.

card.name: Hazakh Agenda
card.text: Choose up to one for each color among blue, black, and red among permanents you control. • Create two 2/2 colorless Minion creature tokens with decayed. • You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards. • Until end of turn, creatures lose all abilities.

card.name: Vishanki Agenda
card.text: Choose up to one for each color among black, red, and green among permanents you control. • Put up to two target nonland cards from graveyards on top of their owners' libraries in any order. • Exile the top two cards of target player's library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. • Target player creates two tapped Treasure tokens. Exile Vishanki Agenda.

card.name: Penrath Agenda
card.text: Choose up to one for each color among red, green, and white among permanents you control. • Target player creates a 2/2 red Berserker creature token with haste and "This creature can't block." • Creatures target player controls get +1/+0 and gain trample until end of turn. • Penrath Agenda deals damage equal to the number of creatures you control to target creature.

card.name: Sillaman Agenda
card.text: Choose up to one for each color among green, white, and blue among permanents you control. • Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. • Target player draws a card for each creature they control with a counter on it. • Untap all nonland permanents target player controls.

card.name: Scandalous Revelation
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard any number of cards. When you do, destroy all nonland permanents with mana value X or less, where X is the number of cards you discarded. You gain X life.

card.name: Coup D'Etat
card.text: Choose up to X target creatures. Switch their power and toughness until end of turn. All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Work Safety Violation
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Out With a Bang
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains "Whenever this creature is dealt damage, you may have it fight target creature you don't control." Then, it fights target creature you don't control.

card.name: Prime for Innovation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Once each turn, you may cast a spell that targets enchanted creature without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Estrathe, Center of Civilization
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

card.name: Incumbency
card.text: Draw a card, gain 3 life, then make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) If you've cast four or more spells named Incumbency this game and there are five colors among permanents you control, you win the game.

card.name: Gaze Upon Civilization
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Old Times Ruminator

card.name: Venture Capitalist
card.text: When Venture Capitalist enters, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle. You may play that card this turn. {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Bulk Bioengineering
card.text: You can't cast noncreature spells. Creature spells you cast cost {X} less to cast, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

card.name: The Connaistone
card.text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, instead you may put a card you own from outside the game into your hand. {T}: Draw two cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Krint, Five Star
card.text: Flash This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn. When Krint enters, choose any number of target creature cards in graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn. Return them to the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to their total mana value.

card.name: Chief Executive Dhante
card.text: Flying Whenever Chief Executive Dhante enters or attacks, create a Treasure token, then you may pay {X}. Spend only mana from artifact sources, and X can't be 0. When you do, destroy target nonland permanent with mana value X or less.

card.name: Eo, the Great Equalizer
card.text: Trample Other creatures have base power and toughness 3/3. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Eo unless you attacked this turn.

card.name: Severin, Sparkmind
card.text: You may remove +1/+1 counters from creatures you control as though they were loyalty counters on Severin, Sparkmind to pay its loyalty costs. [0]: Create a 0/0 colorless Robot artifact creature token with two +1/+1 counters on it. [-2]: You may tap or untap each of up to three target permanents. [-7]: If it isn't an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: The Quindral Accords
card.text: When The Quindral Accords enters, make a pledge. (Create any white, blue, black, red, or green Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) Pledge — {3}{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Create a 5/5 Robot artifact creature token named Sentry of the New World that's all colors, then look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: Garren, Returned Prophet
card.text: [+1]: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards. [-1]: You may sacrifice a creature. When you do, return target creature card with equal or lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. [-2]: You may exile a creature card from your graveyard. When you do, Garren deals damage equal to the exiled creature's power to target creature.

card.name: High Senator Talpa
card.text: Vigilance When High Senator Talpa enters or attacks, choose one — • If an opponent has more life than you, gain 3 life. • If an opponent controls more creatures than you, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token. • If an opponent has more cards in hand than you, draw a card.

card.name: Scrapyard Mecha
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards. If you do, discard a card. Exile two creature cards from your graveyard: Scrapyard Mecha becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. Crew 2

card.name: Survivors of the New World
card.text: When Survivors of the New World enters, if it isn't a token, create two tokens that are copies of it. When Survivors of the New World dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Estrathian Gentrifiers
card.text: Estrathian Gentrifiers's power is equal to the number of differently named lands you control. Whenever Estrathian Gentrifiers enters or attacks, you may sacrifice a basic land. If you do, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Tomer, Figurehead President
card.text: Tomer, Figurehead President is all colors and all creature types. Spells you cast have conspire. (As you cast a spell with conspire, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

card.name: The Majority Whip
CNY Tiril Bureau CNY
card.text: (This token is white, blue, and black.) Pledge — {4}: Surveil 2. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: CNY Hazakh Arsenal CNY
card.text: (This token is blue, black, and red) Pledge — {4}: Create a 2/2 colorless Minion creature token with decayed. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: CNY Vishanki Inc CNY
card.text: (This token is black, red, and green.) Pledge — {4}: Create a Treasure token. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: CNY Penrath Insurgency CNY
card.text: (This token is red, green, and white.) Pledge — {4}: Up to one target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: CNY Sillaman Laboratories CNY
card.text: (This token is green, white, and blue.) Pledge — {4}: Tap up to one target untapped creature. You may put a +1/+1 counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery unless you're making a pledge.

card.name: CNY Minion CNY
card.text: Decayed (This can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: CNY Treasure CNY
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: CNY Sentry of the New World CNY
card.text: (This token is all colors.)

card.name: CNY Berserker CNY
card.text: Haste This creature can't block.

card.name: CNY Chaneryx, Perfect Lifeform CNY
card.text: Ward {10} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {10}.)

card.name: CNY Equipment CNY
card.text: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {2}

card.name: Chromatic Rift Promo
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy all multicolored creatures. • Destroy all monocolored creatures. • Destroy all colorless creatures.

card.name: Incumbency Promo !promo!design Stasis
card.text: Draw a card, gain 3 life, then make a pledge. (Create any white Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) If you've cast four or more spells named Incumbency this game and there are five colors among permanents you control, you win the game.

card.name: Severin's Masterwork Promo
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each tapped creature you control. {G}{W}{U}, Remove five counters from among creatures you control, Sacrifice Severin's Masterwork: Create Chaneryx, Perfect Lifeform, a legendary 10/10 green, white, and blue Leviathan creature token with ward {10}.

card.name: Gaze Upon Civilization Promo
card.text: You may look at the top card of your library any time. Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a spell with mana value less than or equal to your approval from your hand or the top of your library without paying its mana cost. (Your approval contains up to one different permanent of each color.)

card.name: Sparks of a Revolution Promo
card.text: (Once a turn, as a sorcery, mark a condition as complete. When all are complete, transform it.) When Sparks of a Revolution enters, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token. It gains haste until end of turn. Three or more sources you controlled dealt damage this turn. A source you controlled dealt 3 or more damage this turn. --- (Back): Freedom

card.name: Freedom
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier creature token that's tapped and attacking. --- (Front): Sparks of a Revolution Promo

card.name: Coup D'Etat Promo
card.text: Choose up to X target creatures. Switch their power and toughness until end of turn. All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Defect Promo
card.text: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has decayed.

card.name: Search and Seizure Promo
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. Otherwise, draw a card.

card.name: Vishanki Hellkite Promo
card.text: Flying, trample, haste Vishanki Hellkite enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each mana from an artifact source spent to cast it.

card.name: Whirring Inspector Promo
card.text: Flash Flying When Whirring Inspector enters, look at target player's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it until your next turn. When you don't, exile up to one target nonland permanent that player controls until your next turn.

card.name: Work Safety Violation Promo
card.text: Destroy target nonland permanent. Create a Treasure token.

card.name: Estrathe, Center of Civilization Promo
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: For each color among permanents you control, add one mana of that color.

card.name: Ballot Registrar
card.text: When Ballot Registrar enters, make a pledge. (Create any blue Clique enchantment token. If you already control a Clique, instead activate its Pledge without paying its cost.) Activated abilities of nonland permanents you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.

card.name: Dhante's Inferno
card.text: Dhante's Inferno deals 4 damage to any target. Create a number of tapped Treasure tokens equal to the amount of excess damage dealt this way. {X}, Exile Dhante's Inferno from your graveyard: Each opponent loses X life and you gain X life. Spend only mana from artifact sources to activate this ability. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Evasive Tactics
card.text: Target creature gains hexproof until end of turn. Teach it vigilance. (Put a vigilance counter on it. If it already has vigilance, put a +1/+1 counter on it instead.)

card.name: Penrath Roperunner
card.text: Flying Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a green permanent, instead put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: The Codex CNY
card.text: {T}: Mill a card. {T}, Sacrifice this token: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.
